subsection_name: bui-phoi-silic.json_1_Common symptoms of silica dust disease
subsection_content:
The first signs of silicosis may be: (4)
Persistent cough, sometimes accompanied by phlegm; Shortness of breath; Short of breath
Symptoms that appear next include:
Tired; Losing weight; Pain, discomfort and chest tightness; Fever; Night sweats; Swollen legs; Blue lips; Respiratory failure
Difficulty breathing and persistent cough are the first symptoms of the disease
